snippet.title: Becoming Saint - New Gameplay trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist the game on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2643010/Becoming_Saint/?utm_source=youtubeNewGameplayTrailer

Choose your doctrine and preach across medieval Italy in this real-time strategy roguelike. Will you succeed in establishing your heretical movement and convert the whole country to your beliefs?
- Define your creed through in-game choices
- Gather followers and define your strategy
- Engage in real-time medieval battles
- Strive to become a saint... or die and start again!

Becoming Saint socials
Steam Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2643010/Becoming_Saint/
Website: https://firesquid.games/games/becoming-saint
Discord: https://discord.gg/vsxD6n8P8J
Twitter: https://x.com/Becoming_Saint

Trailer maker: Open Lab Games
